description: This Java class TicketMetricsService is a service component in a backend application responsible for processing uploaded Excel files (specifically .xlsx format), extracting ticket data, calculating key metrics such as SLA adherence, MTTR, and ticket counts, and providing access to stored metrics with filtering options. It also includes methods for mapping internal data to API response DTOs, header parsing, and validation.

classes.name: TicketMetricsService
classes.description: Spring service component that processes Excel uploads for ticket metrics, stores results, and provides retrieval and mapping functions for external API responses.

methods.name: computeMetrics
methods.description: Parses an uploaded Excel file to compute overall ticket metrics, including SLA adherence and MTTR, adds a summary entry to internal store.

methods.name: getMetrics
methods.description: Retrieves stored metrics entries filtered optionally by application name and month.

methods.name: mapToApiDto
methods.description: Maps internal TicketMetricEntry objects to API response DTOs with formatted fields and optional full month name.
